ing: 1 (14.5 ounce) can RED GOLDÂ® Petite Diced Tomatoes with Garlic & Olive Oil, well drained
1 (9 ounce) box rosemary and olive oil wheat crackers, or baguette slices
des: "A quick, easy appetizer recipe for game day or a cocktail party.  Our deliciously flavored Red GoldÂ® Petite Diced Tomatoes with Garlic & Olive Oil are what make this recipe so quick and simple!  All you have to add is fresh basil and grated Parmesan Cheese Â– now that is easy!"
ins:
Place 2 teaspoons of Red Gold Petite Diced Tomatoes with Garlic & Olive Oil on each cracker or baguette slice.
Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon cheese and 1/2 teaspoon of basil.  Place on serving tray.
